name: fullscreen
objective: activate fullscreen mode in Writer
description: Check if it is possible to activate the full screen mode in the Writer application

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
Click on the top left "View" button
In the drop-down menu, click on "Full screen"
steps.expected: The full screen mode is activated

author: elebideau

name: scan
objective: insert a picture by scanning from Writer
description: Check if the Writer application handles the scanning support
pre_condition: Have a scanning device installed on the system

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Writer window, click on "Insert"

author: elebideau

name: create-writer
objective: Create a new Writer document
description: Check for Writer starting properly

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

author: elebideau

name: open-odt
objective: open an odt file with Writer
description: Check if Writer is able to open odt files
pre_condition: Have Writer started and have an odt file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The odt file is correctly opened in Writer

author: elebideau

description: Check if Writer is able to open doc files
pre_condition: Have Writer started and have a doc file in the home directory

steps.expected: The doc file is correctly opened in Writer

author: elebideau

name: edit
objective: edit a document with Writer
description: Check if Writer allows to edit documents
pre_condition: Have Writer started in foreground with an existing Writer document open

steps.description: Type some letters with the keyboard
steps.expected: The letters are printed on the Writer page

author: elebideau

name: save-odt
objective: save an odt file with Writer
description: Check if Writer allows to save odt documents
pre_condition: Have Writer started in foreground with an unsaved and edited document open

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "ODT Text Document (.odt)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in odt format in the selected directory

author: elebideau

name: save-doc
objective: save a doc file
description: Check if Writer allows to save doc documents
pre_condition: Have Writer started in foreground with an unsaved and edited document open

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "Microsoft Word 97/2000/XP/2003 (.doc)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in doc format in the selected directory

author: elebideau

name: formatting
objective: apply several text style (bold, italic  ...)
description: Check if Writer allows to modify text style
pre_condition: Have Writer started in foreground with and edited document open

steps.expected: The text is in bold style
The text is in bold and italic style
The text is in bold, italic and underlined style
The text style is applied to the text

author: elebideau

name: odt-doc-conversion
objective: odt>doc>odt
description: Check if Writer is able to convert an odt file into a doc file, and to convert this doc file into an odt file while respecting the format
pre_condition: Have Writer started and have an odt file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The odt file is correctly opened in Writer

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "Microsoft Word 97/2000/XP/2003 (.doc)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu
In the "Confirm File Format" window, click on "Use Microsoft Word 97/2000/XP/2003 Format"
steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in doc format in the selected directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The doc file is correctly opened in Writer

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "ODT Text Document (.odt)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in odt format in the selected directory and it is equal to the original odt file

author: elebideau

name: odt-docx-conversion
objective: odt>docx>odt
description: Check if Writer is able to convert an odt file into a docx file, and to convert this docx file into an odt file while respecting the format
pre_condition: Have Writer started and have an odt file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The odt file is correctly opened in Writer

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "Microsoft Word 2007/2010 XML (.docx)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu
In the "Confirm File Format" window, click on "Use Microsoft Word 2007/2010 XML Format"
steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in docx format in the selected directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The docx file is correctly opened in Writer

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "ODT Text Document (.odt)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in odt format in the selected directory and it is equal to the original odt file

author: elebideau

name: comments
objective: Attach comments to documents text ranges
description: Check if the new comments attach feature provided by LibreOffice 4 works
pre_condition: Have Writer started and have an edited document open

steps.description: Click on a line, on or next to the text
Click on "Insert" in the top bar
in the drop-down menu, click on "Comment
steps.expected: A Comment box is now visible next to the document page, pointing where the cursor was placed before clicking on "Insert"

steps.description: Type some letters in the box and check if they appears
steps.expected: The comment feature is correctly working
